title: Azure IoT Developer Specialty (AZ-220)
description: Develop solutions for Azure IoT services and edge devices
content: Master Azure IoT solutions development with comprehensive training on IoT Hub, Edge computing, device management, and data processing. Build enterprise-ready IoT solutions with security and optimization best practices.

Experience with programming languages (C#, JavaScript, Python, etc.)

personalStory.story: As a developer who has built dozens of cloud-native applications on Azure, I've made every mistake in the book—and learned from them. From serverless architectures to containerized workloads, I'll show you the development patterns that lead to maintainable, scalable applications. This isn't theory; it's what works in production.
